sentences.english: ObjectiveTo measure cortical areas involved ankle dorsiflexion and planter flexion.
sentences.chinese: 目的检测参与踝关节背屈和跖屈运动的脑区。

sentences.english: Come on inchoate because synovitis of Zhi foot joint is local, often produce gall.
sentences.chinese: 发病早期常由于跖趾关节滑膜炎局部发生肿痛。

sentences.english: The patient was diagnosed as Papillon -Lefèvre syndrome based on special features.
sentences.chinese: 根据以上特点诊断为掌跖角化症并发牙周病。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the results of 3 different treatment methods for the tarsometatarsal joint fracture dislocations.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较3种不同方法治疗跗跖关节骨折脱位的疗效。

sentences.english: Use carrageenin to make white rats' toes tumorous.
sentences.chinese: 应用角叉菜胶致大鼠足跖肿胀。

sentences.english: Confucius's suggestion didn't relieve Robber Zhi's fury.
sentences.chinese: 盗跖的气头并没有因为孔子这番建议而稍微缓和。

sentences.english: According to their standards, Jie and Robber Zhi were evil persons, while Zen Can and Shi You were kind.
sentences.chinese: 在他们仁义的标准里，坏人有桀及跖，好人有曾史等。

sentences.english: The sweat effects were studied by the way of affecting sweat secretion of the rats' paw.
sentences.chinese: 通过对大鼠足跖汗液分泌的影响观察其发汗解表作用。

sentences.english: Objective To research the surgical treatment and its result of the injury of tarsometatarsal joints.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨跖跗关节损伤的手术治疗及其疗效。

ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
